/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the buildings that line the street. These structures are adorned with vibrant signs and advertisements, adding a splash of color to the urban landscape. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and motorcycles weaving their way through the traffic. Pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalks, adding a human element to the scene. Above, the sky is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, providing a stark contrast to the bustling activity below.
